Package com.github.littleBitsman.Color3

Class Color3

java.lang.Object
com.github.littleBitsman.Color3.Color3
public final class Color3 extends Object
Better Scalar class that allows conversion between the two (this and Scalar) and stores three color values.

    • toScalar

      public com.github.littleBitsman.Color3.opencv_scalar_repackaged.Scalar toScalar()
      Converts this Color3 to a Scalar with the equivalent R, G and B values and an A value of 0.
      Returns:
      Equivalent Scalar with the R, G and B values and an A value of 0.

    • toScalar

      public com.github.littleBitsman.Color3.opencv_scalar_repackaged.Scalar toScalar(double A)
      Converts this Color3 to a Scalar with the equivalent R, G and B values and a set A value in the function. A defaults to 0.
      Parameters:
      A - The A value of the Scalar.
      Returns:
      Equivalent Scalar with the R, G and B values and the set A value.

    • fromRGB

      public static Color3 fromRGB(double r, double g, double b)
      Equivalent to the initializer of Color3. (Basically only exists for people who don't like using regular initializers lol)
      Parameters:
      r - Red value
      g - Green value
      b - Blue value
      Returns:
      A new Color3.

    • fromHSV

      @Deprecated(since="1.0") public static Color3 fromHSV(double h, double s, double v)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a new Color3 using HSV values instead of the default RGB values. Very unstable and inaccurate.
      Parameters:
      h - Hue value
      s - Saturation value
      v - Vibrance value
      Returns:
      A new Color3.

    • fromScalar

      public static Color3 fromScalar(com.github.littleBitsman.Color3.opencv_scalar_repackaged.Scalar scalar)
      Converts a Scalar to a Color3. The Scalar's A value is discarded.
      Parameters:
      scalar - The Scalar to be converted.
      Returns:
      Color3 with equivalent R, G and B values of scalar.

    • HSVtoRGB

      @Deprecated(since="1.0") public static Color3 HSVtoRGB(double hue, double saturation, double value)
      Deprecated.
      Util function that converts HSV (also known as HSB) to RGB. Very unreliable and it is not recommended to use this.
      Parameters:
      hue - Hue value.
      saturation - Saturation value.
      value - Brightness value (also known as "value")
      Returns:
      A Color3 with the corresponding RGB value of the passed in HSV/HSB value.
